import React from "react" import "./css/Closet.css" import {icons} from "./Icons" import CategoryList from "./CategoryList" import Footer from "./Footer" import UploadPopup from "./UploadPopup" export default function Closet() { const [isPopupShown, setIsPopupShown] = React.useState(false); function bringUploadPic() { const showPopup = isPopupShown && setIsPopupShown(prevStatus => !prevStatus); } return (
Category
